did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Maps of Various New Kent and King William County, Virginia, Cemeteries, compiled 2010-2011

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hawthorne and Loretta Davis. Maps of Various Cemeteries in New Kent and King William Counties, Virginia. Compiled 2010-2011. Accession 45465. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Hawthorne and Loretta Davis, Mechanicsville, 16 March 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Maps, prepared by Hawthorne and Loretta Davis in 2011, of various cemeteries in New Kent and King William Counties, Virginia. Data given includes name, locality, and GPS coordinates of the cemetery, and shows (to scale) the location of named graves, unmarked graves, no-name markers, and trees. Cemeteries represented are: Union Baptist Church Cemetery (Quinton, New Kent County); old cemetery of Olivet Presbyterian Church (Providence Forge, New Kent County); Corinth Baptist Church Cemetery (New Kent Highway, New Kent County); Second Elam Baptist Church Cemetery (Cooks Mills Road, New Kent County); Good Hope Baptist Church Cemetery (Good Hope Road, Lanexa, New Kent County); and Gregory Cemetery (Elsing Green, King William County). Other maps may be added in the future.

Loretta and Hawthorne Davis have compiled several books on cemeteries in New Kent and King William Counties, Virginia, many of which correspond to the cemeteries represented in this collection. These works are available in the Library of Virginia's book collection.
